title: Stocky
description: Stocky is a web app that lets store owners manage multiple stores easily.
features: User authentication and authorization management
Stock and inventory management
Company, customers and employee management
Product and product category management
Reports and analytics
Settings and application configuration
Search and filter functionality for easy product discovery
Data Import and Export

title: HealthSuite
description: HealthSuite is a robust Hospital Management Information System. It aims to help hospitals of any size manage their entire process in one place.
features: EMR (Electronic Medical Records)
Pharmacy Module: Enables managing inventory, dispensing drugs
Billing and Payment Module: Handles billing and payment processes
Cashier Shift Management: Tracks and controls cashiers shift
Settings and Configuration Module: Allows customizing and configuring the system
Nurse Module: Provides features for nurses to manage their tasks
Doctor's Clerking Module: Provides features for doctors to manage their tasks
Laboratory Module: Provides features for laboratory technicians to manage their tasks
Radiology Module: Provides features for radiology technicians
Reports Module: Provides features for generating and viewing various reports
Users, Role and Permission Module: For managing roles and access rights
Data Import and Export

title: MedPay
description: MedPay, A mobile app that revolutionize the way patients pay their hospital bills. It offers a seamless and hassle-free experience, eliminating the traditional complexities associated with medical bill payments.
features: Streamlined Hospital Payment Management: MedPay empowers hospitals to efficiently manage patient payments
Convenient Mobile Payment: With MedPay, patients can easily pay their medical bills using their mobile phones
Flexible Payment Options: MedPay allows patients to seek financial assistance from their relatives or loved ones by sharing a secure bill payment link
Accelerated Access to Treatment: By facilitating quick and efficient payment processes, MedPay helps patients receive the timely treatment they deserve
User Management: Manage users from both mobile application and web application seamlessly
Payment Gateway Integration: Integrate Payment Gateway to handle patient bill settlement efficiently
Transaction Management: View, transaction and download Reports on transactions filtered by multiple parameters
Users, Role and Permission Module: For managing roles and access rights
Data Import and Export

title: SchoolBox
description: SchoolBox is a Student Life Management System that helps schools of all levels manage all of their activities efficiency.
features: Fee and Transaction Management
Result Management
Staff Management
Student Management
User Authentication and Authorization Management
Student Application and Enrollment Management
Course Registration and Course Management
Student Hostel Management
Library Management
